item.title: .NET Aspire and Redis
item.description: First look into .NET Aspire I decided to give .NET Aspire a try. I’ve never seen any online tutorials on how to use it. I watched its announcement a few months ago and thought YATTA - Yet Another Technology To Avoid - as it made no sense to me. Since then, I’ve seen a lot of tweets about .NET Aspire. So, over the last month or so, I’ve gradually grasped its raison d’être.
